verses.verse: Now the leaders <S%H8269><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> but the rest <S%H7605><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> cast <S%H5307><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> one <S%H259><s%> out of ten <S%H6235><s%> to live <S%H3427><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> while nine-tenths [remained] in the [other] cities. <S%H5892><s%>
And the people <S%H5971><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> who volunteered <S%H5068><s%> to live <S%H3427><s%> in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Now these <S%H428><s%> are the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the provinces <S%H4082><s%> who <S%H834><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> but in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> each <S%H376><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> on his own property <S%H272><s%> in their cities <S%H5892><s%> â€“ the Israelites, <S%H3478><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> the temple <S%H5411><s%> servants <S%H5411><s%> and the descendants <S%H1121><s%> of Solomon's servants. <S%H5650><s%>

And some <S%H4480><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and some <S%H4480><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> From the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> Athaiah <S%H6265><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziah, <S%H5818><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amariah, <S%H568><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shephatiah, <S%H8203><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mahalalel, <S%H4111><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Perez; <S%H6557><s%>

and Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baruch, <S%H1263><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Col-hozeh, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hazaiah, <S%H2382><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Adaiah, <S%H5718><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joiarib, <S%H3080><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of the Shilonite. <S%H7888><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Perez <S%H6557><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> were 468 able <S%H2428><s%> men. <S%H376><s%>

Now these <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%> Sallu <S%H9365><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshullam, <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joed, <S%H3133><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedaiah, <S%H6305><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kolaiah, <S%H6964><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maaseiah, <S%H4641><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ithiel, <S%H384><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshaiah; <S%H3470><s%>
and after <S%H310><s%> him Gabbai <S%H1373><s%> [and] Sallai, <S%H9367><s%> 928.

And Joel <S%H3100><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zichri <S%H2147><s%> was their overseer, <S%H6496><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hassenuah <S%H5574><s%> was second <S%H4932><s%> in command <S%H5921><s%> of the city. <S%H5892><s%>
From the priests: <S%H3548><s%> Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joiarib, <S%H3080><s%> Jachin, <S%H3199><s%>

Seraiah <S%H8304><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hilkiah, <S%H2518><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshullam, <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zadok, <S%H6659><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meraioth, <S%H4812><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahitub, <S%H285><s%> the leader <S%H5057><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%>

and their kinsmen <S%H251><s%> who performed <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of the temple, <S%H1004><s%> 822; and Adaiah <S%H5718><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham, <S%H3395><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pelaliah, <S%H6421><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amzi, <S%H557><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pashhur, <S%H6583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Malchijah, <S%H4441><s%>

and his kinsmen, <S%H251><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers' [households,]; <S%H242><s%> and Amashsai <S%H6023><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azarel, <S%H5832><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahzai, <S%H273><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshillemoth, <S%H4919><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Immer, <S%H564><s%>
and their brothers, <S%H251><s%> valiant <S%H2428><s%> warriors, <S%H1368><s%> 128. And their overseer <S%H6496><s%> was Zabdiel, <S%H2068><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Haggedolim. <S%H9092><s%>

Now from the Levites: <S%H3881><s%> Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hasshub, <S%H2815><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azrikam, <S%H5840><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hashabiah, <S%H2811><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bunni; <S%H1138><s%>

and Shabbethai <S%H7678><s%> and Jozabad, <S%H3107><s%> from the leaders <S%H7218><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> who were in charge <S%H5921><s%> of the outside <S%H2435><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%>

and Mattaniah <S%H4983><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mica, <S%H4316><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zabdi, <S%H2067><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph, <S%H623><s%> who was the leader <S%H7218><s%> in beginning <S%H8462><s%> the thanksgiving <S%H3034><s%> at prayer, <S%H8605><s%> and Bakbukiah, <S%H1229><s%> the second <S%H4932><s%> among <S%H4480><s%> his brethren; <S%H251><s%> and Abda <S%H5653><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shammua, <S%H8051><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Galal, <S%H1559><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun. <S%H3038><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> [were] 284.
Also the gatekeepers, <S%H7778><s%> Akkub, <S%H6126><s%> Talmon, <S%H2929><s%> and their brethren, <S%H251><s%> who kept <S%H8104><s%> watch <S%H8104><s%> at the gates, <S%H8179><s%> [were] 172.

And the rest <S%H7605><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> of the priests, <S%H3548><s%> [and] of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> [were] in all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> each <S%H376><s%> on his own inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

But the temple <S%H5411><s%> servants <S%H5411><s%> were living <S%H3427><s%> in Ophel, <S%H6077><s%> and Ziha <S%H6727><s%> and Gishpa <S%H1658><s%> were in charge <S%H5921><s%> of the temple <S%H5411><s%> servants. <S%H5411><s%>

Now the overseer <S%H6496><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> was Uzzi <S%H5813><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bani, <S%H1137><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hashabiah, <S%H2811><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mattaniah, <S%H4983><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mica, <S%H4316><s%> from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph, <S%H623><s%> who were the singers <S%H7891><s%> for the service <S%H4399><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

For [there was] a commandment <S%H4687><s%> from the king <S%H4428><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> them and a firm <S%H548><s%> regulation <S%H548><s%> for the song <S%H7891><s%> leaders <S%H7891><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> by day. <S%H3117><s%>

And Pethahiah <S%H6611><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshezabel, <S%H4898><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> was the king's representative <S%H3027><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> matters <S%H1697><s%> concerning the people. <S%H5971><s%>

Now as for the villages <S%H9161><s%> with their fields, <S%H7704><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Kiriath-arba and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> in Dibon <S%H1769><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and in Jekabzeel <S%H6909><s%> and its villages, <S%H9161><s%>
and in Jeshua, <S%H3091><s%> in Moladah <S%H4137><s%> and Beth-pelet,
and in Hazar-shual, in Beersheba <S%H884><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%>
and in Ziklag, <S%H6860><s%> in Meconah <S%H4368><s%> and in its towns, <S%H1323><s%>
and in En-rimmon, in Zorah <S%H6881><s%> and in Jarmuth, <S%H3412><s%>

Zanoah, <S%H2182><s%> Adullam, <S%H5725><s%> and their villages, <S%H9161><s%> Lachish <S%H3923><s%> and its fields, <S%H7704><s%> Azekah <S%H5825><s%> and its towns. <S%H1323><s%> So they encamped <S%H2583><s%> from Beersheba <S%H884><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hinnom. <S%H2011><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> also [lived] from Geba <S%H1387><s%> [onward,] at Michmash <S%H4363><s%> and Aija, <S%H5857><s%> at Bethel <S%H1008><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%>
at Anathoth, <S%H6068><s%> Nob, <S%H5011><s%> Ananiah, <S%H6055><s%>
Hazor, <S%H2674><s%> Ramah, <S%H7414><s%> Gittaim, <S%H1664><s%>
Hadid, <S%H2307><s%> Zeboim, <S%H6650><s%> Neballat, <S%H5041><s%>
Lod <S%H3850><s%> and Ono, <S%H207><s%> the valley <S%H1516><s%> of craftsmen. <S%H2796><s%>
And from the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> [some] divisions <S%H4256><s%> in Judah <S%H3063><s%> belonged to Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>
